meanings.definition: Having or giving off a strong smell.
meanings.sent1: The odiferous flowers filled the room with their sweet scent.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was quite odiferous after sitting in the sun all day.
meanings.sent3: The odiferous cheese made everyone in the room wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The odiferous perfume enveloped her in a cloud of fragrance.
meanings.sent5: The odiferous smoke from the barbecue lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.sent1: The odiferous trash bin needed to be emptied immediately.
meanings.sent2: The skunk sprayed a highly odiferous liquid as a defense mechanism.
meanings.sent3: The odiferous socks left on the floor caused quite a commotion in the house.
meanings.sent4: The odiferous fumes from the factory polluted the surrounding air.
meanings.sent5: The odiferous stench coming from the sewer grate made her hold her breath.
